UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Processing of an antibacterial peptide from hemocyanin of the freshwater crayfish Pacifastacus leniusculus.
Literature.Author: Lee SY, Lee BL, Söderhäll K

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Shigella flexneri ATCC 203(MIC=6000µM),Proteus vulgaris OX19 ATCC 6380(MIC=>6000µM),Escherichia coli D21(MIC=3200µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa OT97(MIC=>6000µM),Bacillus megaterium Bm11(MIC=800µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=3200µM),Staphylococcus aureus Cowan 1(MIC=>6000µM),Staphylococcus aureus JC-1(MIC=1600µM)
